Dua Pemain Persib Bandung Cedera Menjelang Pertemuan dengan PSIS, Dokter Tim Ungkap Kondisinya
03 Nov 2019, 12:12 by Tim Pikiran Rakyat
BANDUNG, (PR).- Kemenangan Persib Bandung atas Kalteng Putra dalam laga lanjutan Shopee Liga 1, Jumat 1 November 2019 harus dibayar cederanya dua pemain. Bek kiri Ardi Idrus mengalami cedera dalam laga itu dan ditarik keluar. Penyerang Persib Bandung Ezechiel N’Douassel juga mengalami hal serupa sebelum laga berakhir.
Dokter tim, Rafi Ghani mengabarkan, keduanya menjalani masa pemulihan selama dua hari pada Sabtu dan Minggu 2-3 November 2019. Kondisi kebugaran keduanya akan dipantau pada Senin 4 November 2019 untuk melihat kesiapannya menjelang pertandingan kandang melawan PSIS pada Rabu 6 November 2019.
"Ada dua pemain yang digantikan karena cedera, Ezechiel N’Douassel dan Ardi Idrus, tapi kami masih harus melakukan observasi. Mudah-mudahan cederanya tidak serius," kata Rafi Ghani seperti dilaporkan Prfmnews.



"Masih ada beberapa hari untuk persiapan sebelum menghadapi PSIS, kami berharap bukan cedera serius," katanya.
Dia menerangkan, cedera yang dialami Ardi Idrus bukan tergolong cedera serius. Hanya, didapati pembengkakan di mata kakinya.
"Ada bengkak di bagian mata kakinya. Tetapi sudah kami tangani, tidak ada masalah dan dia sudah bisa berjalan lagi. Hanya memang masih ada sedikit bengkak. Kelihatannya bukan cedera yang serius," ujar Rafi Ghani.
Sementara cedera Ezechiel N’Douassel adalah nyeri yang dia keluhkan usai memperkuat Timnas Chad. Karena cederanya itu, dia bahkan dicadangkan saat lawan Persebaya dan tidak bermain melawan Bhayangkara FC.
"Ketika pulang dari Chad, dia memang mengeluhkan cedera paha. Sebenarnya kemarin sudah membaik, tapi karena mungkin intensitas permainan tinggi, dia mengalami keluhan itu lagi," ujarnya.***

Two Persib Bandung Players Injured Ahead of the Meeting with PSIS, the Team Doctor Reveals His Condition
Nov 03 2019, 12:12 AM by the People's Mind Team
BANDUNG, (PR) .- Persib Bandung victory over Kalteng Putra in the Shopee League 1 continued match, Friday, November 1, 2019 must be paid for the injuries of two players. Left back Ardi Idrus suffered an injury in the match and was pulled out. Persib Bandung striker Ezechiel N'Douassel also experienced the same thing before the game ended.
Team doctor Rafi Ghani reported that both of them underwent a two-day recovery period on Saturday and Sunday 2-3 November 2019. Their fitness conditions will be monitored on Monday 4 November 2019 to see their readiness ahead of the home match against PSIS on Wednesday 6 November 2019.
"There are two players who were replaced because of injuries, Ezechiel N 'Douassel and Ardi Idrus, but we still have to make observations. Hopefully the injury is not serious," Rafi Ghani said as reported by Prfmnews.



"There are still a few days to prepare before facing PSIS, we hope it is not a serious injury," he said.
He explained, the injury suffered by Ardi Idrus was not classified as a serious injury. Only, found swelling in the ankles.
"There is swelling in the ankle. But we have handled it, there is no problem and he can walk again. Only there is still a bit of swelling. It does not look like a serious injury," Rafi Ghani said.
While Ezechiel N'Douassel's injury was a pain he complained of after strengthening Chad's national team. Because of his injury, he was even reserved as opposed to Persebaya and did not play against Bhayangkara FC.
"When he returned from Chad, he did complain about a thigh injury. Actually yesterday it had improved, but because maybe the intensity of the game was high, he experienced the complaint again," he said.
